title: riot halved the skarner's damage because he could stick to the targets
body: {{champion:64}} lee can do it better while having 10x his damage

hold on a second let's look back over those numbers 1 more time.

Crystal Slash (Q) damage increased to 20/30/40/50/60 from 18/28/38/48/58
Crystal Slash (Q) while charged bonus damage increased to 20/30/40/50/60 from 18/28/38/48/58

Here they did make a nice increase to the damage/level, but let's compare the scaling a damage/lvl to lee sin E. Both of which are aoe and slow.

isn't skarner not really an AD bruiser though?

I find him way more useful as a tank that ults a guy, then that guy who get's ulted gets piled on by the other 4 players on skarner's team and dies.

skarner was released back before riot's balance team shunned the development and existence of hybrid champions, his kit has a lot of things which scale differently depending on how you build him. AD builds can look at him as a bruiser style, AP builds can look at him like an assassin/bruiser, tank builds can view him as a single out tank (like blitz). His kit has many options to build, but isn't very versatile. If you build him like a tank, you probably can't assassinate. If you build him like a bruiser then you probably shouldn't engage into the whole enemy team to initiate. 

I personally use to build a crit-scorpion build, because his crit animation was the only attacks which he would stab with his tail (now his passive triggers are made with his stinger too). Even that was fairly effective.

There are a lot of ways to build Skarner. Mine is {{item:3078}} {{item:3714}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3110}} 

I know a lot of people prefer {{item:3025}} but with Skarner having the highest base AD at level 18 in the game and constant procs I just couldn't pass it up!

Actually, unless you {{summoner:4}} through a wall, {{champion:72}} can ult you, has his Q which gives him movement speed and is super spammy, his W which gives him more movement speed, a slow, and if he lands his E and 2 Q's, which have no cast time and are unblockable, he can basic attack you to stun you. This is further enhanced by the fact that one will usually have a {{item:3078}} to speed him up or a {{item:3025}} to slow you down. 

{{champion:64}} has two dashes, one that he can miss, and another that only works if he has an ally close to you or a ward. His slow is close ranged, and if he's dumb enough, he'll kick you super far away from him. He won't torture you though, scaring you for life and causing you to enter a horrible state of panic every time someone even mentions his name though, make of that what you will.
Skarner also scales much better into late game damage. where as lee is either a tank with utility late game or a glass cannon.
